#Luhansk axis:

Ukrainian and Russian forces continued limited attacks on the Svatove-Kreminna line and south of #Kreminna on July 3. The Russian MoD claimed that Ukrainian forces conducted counteroffensive operations in the Lyman direction. https://t.co/PfQyAsILT5 https://t.co/ocBlKpA4l1 pic.twitter.com/QQ0XEsSkda

#Donetsk:

Russian milbloggers continued to discuss Ukrainian #counteroffensive operations SW of #Bakhmut, particularly between Kurdiumivka & Klishchiivka.

Geolocated combat footage posted on July 2 shows that UKR forces have advanced towards the treeline west of Klishchiivka. https://t.co/ocBlKpA4l1 pic.twitter.com/C0zGgEQQE0

Southern #Ukraine:

Ukrainian forces continued attacks along the western #Donetsk/eastern #Zaporizhia border on July 3. UKR Deputy Defense Minister Malyar reported that UKR forces conducted successful offensive operations west & south of Velyka Novosilka. https://t.co/PfQyAsILT5 https://t.co/ocBlKpA4l1 pic.twitter.com/tK8bsc9Jvi

1676062494152859652.html:
Southern #Ukraine:

Ukrainian forces conducted limited ground attacks in western #Zaporizhia on July 2.

A Russian milblogger claimed UKR forces captured an unspecified number of RU positions near Luhivske (18km SE of Orikhiv) and advanced toward Robotyne (12km south of Orikhiv). https://t.co/ocBlKpA4l1 pic.twitter.com/8kNrQatRBp
